meanings.definition: In a kind and giving manner.
meanings.sent1: She smiled generously at the children playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: He always shares his toys generously with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The generous baker gave away free cookies to everyone in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The sun generously bathed the garden in warm light.
meanings.sent5: The teacher generously praised the students for their hard work.

meanings.definition: To a large or ample degree.
meanings.sent1: He generously poured the milk into the cereal bowl.
meanings.sent2: The chef generously seasoned the soup with herbs and spices.
meanings.sent3: The rain generously watered the thirsty plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: She generously donated her time to help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The artist generously painted the entire mural on the wall.
